law.catch_line: Parking near rural mailbox during certain hours; penalties.

text.section:
Sec. 30-296. Parking near rural mailbox during certain hours; penalties.
Whoever parks any vehicle within thirty (30) feet of any rural mailbox upon any State highway in this State between 8:00 a.m. and 3:00 p.m. shall be punished by a fine not exceeding thirty dollars ($30.00) or by imprisonment not exceeding thirty (30) days.
